# players

**Instance Property**

The array of players associated with the session.

## Declaration

```swift
var players: [AVPlayer] { get }
```

## Managing players

- **addPlayer(_:)**: Adds a player to the session.
- **removePlayer(_:)**: Removes a player from the session.

items.description: Adds a player to the session.
items.name: addPlayer(_:)

items.description: Removes a player from the session.
items.name: removePlayer(_:)
